meanings.definition: Things characteristic of or imitative of Japanese art or culture.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful japonaiseries from Japan.
meanings.sent2: Her room was filled with colorful japonaiseries.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations included playful japonaiseries.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was a blend of Western and japonaiseries influences.
meanings.sent5: The garden was transformed into a serene oasis with delicate japonaiseries.

meanings.definition: The use of Japanese motifs in art or design.
meanings.sent1: The artist incorporated intricate japonaiseries into the painting.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer's collection featured elegant japonaiseries.
meanings.sent3: The interior decorator added unique japonaiseries to the room.
meanings.sent4: The logo design had subtle japonaiseries elements.
meanings.sent5: The packaging design was inspired by traditional japonaiseries patterns.
